Package Controller

package Controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminController
    AdminController is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - AdminView, DisplayStaffView and ManageStaffAccountView and the model class - Admin and Staff.
    AppointmentController
    The AppointmentController class is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - AdminView and DisplayAppointmentDetailView, and the model classes - Admin and Appointment.
    AppointmentOutcomeController
    The AppointmentOutcomeController class manages operations related to appointment outcomes, specifically handling pending medicine prescriptions, approval, and inventory updates.
    DoctorController
    The DoctorController class provides methods for managing doctor-related operations, such as retrieving schedules, handling availability, managing specializations, and retrieving associated patients and appointments.
    InventoryController
    InventoryController is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - AdminView, InventoryView, DisplayMedicalInventoryView ManageMedicalInventoryView and ManagReplenishmentRequestView and the model class - Admin, InventoryList and Medicine.
    PatientController
    The PatientController class provides functionality for managing patient-related operations, such as authentication, updating contact information, displaying personal information, viewing medical records, and retrieving appointment outcomes.
    PaymentController
    The PaymentController class handles the logic for generating payment receipts, processing payments, and updating payment statuses for medical appointments.
    PharmacistController
    The PharmacistController class handles operations related to pharmacist authentication, password management, and submission of replenishment requests for inventory items.
    StaffController
    StaffController is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - AdminView, PatientView, PharmacistView and View and the model class - Admin, Doctor, Patient, Pharmacist and Staff.
